person.persName: William Mercer (Caldwell County and Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County and Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Missouri native. Married to Susan Wheeler Mercer in Livingston County, Kentucky, on November 16, 1826. Father of John E. Mercer. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Ballard County in 1860.
